sentences.en: Do you always slurp when a milkshake?
sentences.cn: 你总是这样啧啧喝牛奶 吗 ?

sentences.en: He blew on his soup before slurping it off the spoon.
sentences.cn: 他先吹了吹汤，然后出声地从匙子里喝汤。

sentences.en: He takes a slurp from a cup of black coffee.
sentences.cn: 他咕嘟喝了一口清咖啡。

sentences.en: In order to maintain their this kind of survival condition, they must slurp the blood.
sentences.cn: 为了维持他们这种生存状态, 他们必须吸食鲜血.

sentences.en: You may not slurp your soup.

trans.tran_en: to drink a liquid while making a noisy sucking sound
